userStory: As a student, I want to see how long a study room is available so that I can choose one and study accordingly.
feedback: This story is outside the app's scope, as it focuses on study room availability rather than task management features. Please align your user story with the app's core functionalities. (-5)

userStory: As a user, I want to filter products in a price range, so that I can find one within my budget.
feedback: This story is outside the app's scope, as it focuses on filtering products, which is not relevant to a ToDo app. Please revise to align with the app's features. (-5)
